message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think you'd really value. I'm asking for $95 for it. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate it, but I can only pay up to $85 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite ready to go that low yet. How about $90? That gives us both a bit of room to compromise.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $87 for the product. Let me know if this works for you.
